localize.title: 凯文-詹姆斯在吃辣子鸡翅的时候忘记了自己是谁|Hot Ones
localize.description:

next.excerpt:
It's The Couples Quiz! In this episode, we peek into the relationship of singing legend Ciara and Seattle Seahawks star quarterback Russell Wilson. It's the ultimate test of relationship knowledge -- who knows the other better? What is Ciara's secret hidden talent? When did Russell start playing football?

Still haven’t subscribed to GQ on YouTube? ►► http://bit.ly/2iij5wt
Subscribe to GQ magazine and get rare swag: https://bit.ly/2xNBH3i

ABOUT GQ
For more than 50 years, GQ has been the premier men’s magazine, providing definitive coverage of style, culture, politics and more. In that tradition, GQ’s video channel covers every part of a man’s life, from entertainment and sports to fashion and grooming advice. So join celebrities from 2 Chainz, Stephen Curry and Channing Tatum to Amy Schumer, Kendall Jenner and Kate Upton for a look at the best in pop culture. Welcome to the modern man’s guide to style advice, dating tips, celebrity videos, music, sports and more.

https://www.youtube.com/user/GQVideos

Ciara & Russell Wilson Ask Each Other 33 Questions | The Couples Quiz | GQ
next.title: Ciara & Russell Wilson Ask Each Other 33 Questions | The Couples Quiz | GQ

localize.title: Ciara和Russell Wilson互问33个问题｜情侣问答｜GQ
localize.description:
这是情侣问答! 在本期节目中，我们将窥探歌坛传奇Ciara和西雅图海鹰队明星四分卫Russell Wilson的关系。这是关系知识的终极测试--谁更了解对方？Ciara的秘密隐藏天赋是什么？拉塞尔什么时候开始打橄榄球的？

还没在YouTube上订阅GQ吗？►► http://bit.ly/2iij5wt

订阅《GQ》杂志，即可获得珍贵的奖品：https://bit.ly/2xNBH3i。



关于GQ

50多年来，《GQ》一直是首屈一指的男性杂志，提供风格、文化、政治等方面的权威报道。秉承这一传统，GQ的视频频道涵盖了男人生活的方方面面，从娱乐和运动到时尚和修饰建议。因此，从2 Chainz、Stephen Curry和Channing Tatum到Amy Schumer、Kendall Jenner和Kate Upton等名人，都可以加入到GQ视频频道中来，一睹流行文化的风采。欢迎来到现代男人的风格建议、约会技巧、名人视频、音乐、运动等指南。



https://www.youtube.com/user/GQVideos

Ciara和Russell Wilson互问33个问题｜情侣问答｜GQ

localize.title: Ciara和Russell Wilson互問33個問題｜情侶問答｜GQ
localize.description:
這是情侶問答! 在本期節目中，我們將窺探歌壇傳奇Ciara和西雅圖海鷹隊明星四分衛Russell Wilson的關係。這是關係知識的終極測試--誰更瞭解對方？Ciara的祕密隱藏天賦是什麼？拉塞爾什麼時候開始打橄欖球的？

還沒在YouTube上訂閱GQ嗎？►► http://bit.ly/2iij5wt

訂閱《GQ》雜誌，即可獲得珍貴的獎品：https://bit.ly/2xNBH3i。

50多年來，《GQ》一直是首屈一指的男性雜誌，提供風格、文化、政治等方面的權威報道。秉承這一傳統，GQ的視頻頻道涵蓋了男人生活的方方面面，從娛樂和運動到時尚和修飾建議。因此，從2 Chainz、Stephen Curry和Channing Tatum到Amy Schumer、Kendall Jenner和Kate Upton等名人，都可以加入到GQ視頻頻道中來，一睹流行文化的風采。歡迎來到現代男人的風格建議、約會技巧、名人視頻、音樂、運動等指南。
